scripts.docker:run: docker run --name postgres-test -e POSTGRES_USER=test -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=test -e POSTGRES_DB=testdb -p 5433:5432 -d postgres
scripts.docker:stop: docker stop postgres-test && docker rm postgres-test
scripts.test:setup: npm run docker:run && npm run migrate:test
scripts.test: npm run test:setup && (dotenv -e .env.test -- jest || (echo 'Tests failed, stopping Docker container...' && npm run docker:stop; exit 1)) && npm run docker:stop
